english.segment1: VERSE 1. Every morning I wake up just to find. Never-ending mercies You made mine. I can't deny the joy inside. You set my world in motion God. And I can't stop spinning
english.segment2: CHORUS. Jesus You lift me up so high. Above all the things that I. Could not ever seem to leave behind. Now with You I cannot be stopped. You are living in my heart. Your life is taking over all of me now. You're taking over now
english.segment3: VERSE 2. All around the world let people sing. Of a God who set the captives free. Salvation is forever Yours. I won't stay silent anymore. And I can't stop singing.
